lines.name: Bottled Faith

explicitModifiers.text: (30-50)% increased Duration
Consecrated Ground created by this Flask has Tripled Radius
+(1-2)% to Critical Strike Chance against Enemies on Consecrated Ground during Effect
Consecrated Ground created during Effect applies (7-10)% increased Damage taken to Enemies

lines.flavourText: A tourniquet for the soul, squeezing ethereal into physical.

lines.name: Soul Ripper

explicitModifiers.text: +(-39-90) to Maximum Charges
Loses all Charges when you enter a new area
Consumes Maximum Charges to use
Gain Vaal Souls equal to Charges Consumed when used

lines.flavourText:
"What care have I for their pain? They're already dead."
- Atalui, Vaal Priestess

lines.name: Cinderswallow Urn

explicitModifiers.text: Recharges 1 Charge when you Consume an Ignited corpse
Enemies Ignited by you during Flask Effect take 10% increased Damage
Recover (1-3)% of Life when you Kill an Enemy during Flask Effect
Recover (1-3)% of Mana when you Kill an Enemy during Flask Effect
Recover (1-3)% of Energy Shield when you Kill an Enemy during Flask Effect

lines.flavourText: A controlled burn is sometimes necessary for new life.

lines.name: The Sorrow of the Divine

explicitModifiers.text: (25-50)% increased Duration
Zealot's Oath during Flask effect
Life Recovery from Flasks also applies to Energy Shield during Flask Effect

lines.flavourText:
As man sins,
God weeps.

lines.name: Sin's Rebirth

implicitModifiers.text: Creates a Smoke Cloud on Use

explicitModifiers.text: Gain Unholy Might during Flask Effect

Immunity to Ignite during Flask effect
Removes Burning on use

lines.flavourText:
And from the ashes he rose, like a black cloud.
The Sin of one became the Sin of many.

lines.name: Dying Sun

explicitModifiers.text: (1-10)% reduced Charges used
(1-10)% increased Charges used
Skills fire 2 additional Projectiles during Flask Effect
(15-25)% increased Area of Effect during Flask Effect

lines.flavourText:
All things must die.
Whether you burn out or explode is up to you.

lines.name: Taste of Hate

explicitModifiers.text: 20% of Physical Damage from Hits taken as Cold Damage during Flask effect
Gain (15-20)% of Physical Damage as Extra Cold Damage during effect
30% chance to Avoid being Chilled during Flask effect
30% chance to Avoid being Frozen during Flask effect

lines.flavourText:
A sip will freeze your lips,
A swig will chill your heart,
A glass will still your soul.

lines.name: Rumi's Concoction

explicitModifiers.text: +(14-20)% Chance to Block Attack Damage during Flask effect
+(6-10)% Chance to Block Spell Damage during Flask effect

lines.flavourText:
"Yesterday I was clever, so I wanted to change the world.
Today I am wise, so I am changing myself."
-Rumi of the Vaal

lines.name: Blood of the Karui

explicitModifiers.text: 100% increased Life Recovered
(5-20)% increased Recovery rate
Recover Full Life at the end of the Flask Effect

lines.flavourText:
"Kaom fought and killed for his people.
Kaom bled for his people.
And so the people gave, the people bled,
So their King might go on."
- Lavianga, Advisor to Kaom

lines.name: Lion's Roar

explicitModifiers.text: Adds Knockback to Melee Attacks during Flask effect
Knocks Back Enemies in an Area when you use a Flask
75% chance to cause Enemies to Flee on use
(20-25)% more Melee Physical Damage during effect

lines.flavourText:
A sprinkle of hunger, a spoonful of menace
and three generous cups of Might.

lines.name: Divination Distillate

explicitModifiers.text: (40-60)% increased Rarity of Items found during Flask effect
(12-18)% increased Quantity of Items found during Flask effect
25% increased Light Radius during Flask effect
+50% to Elemental Resistances during Flask Effect

lines.flavourText:
Knowledge is fermented in pain and loss
Distilled with reflection
To quench the thirst of those
who dream of enlightenment

lines.name: Vessel of Vinktar

explicitModifiers.text: (80-100)% increased Charges used
Shocks nearby Enemies during Flask effect, causing 10% increased Damage taken
You are Shocked during Flask effect, causing 50% increased Damage taken
Adds (25-35) to (110-130) Lightning Damage to Attacks during Flask effect
20% of Lightning Damage Leeched as Life during Flask effect

lines.flavourText: The great city of storms, washed away by Vinktar's thirst for power.

lines.name: Vessel of Vinktar

explicitModifiers.text: (80-100)% increased Charges used
Shocks nearby Enemies during Flask effect, causing 10% increased Damage taken
You are Shocked during Flask effect, causing 50% increased Damage taken
Adds (15-25) to (70-90) Lightning Damage to Spells during Flask effect
20% of Lightning Damage Leeched as Life during Flask effect

lines.flavourText: The great city of storms, washed away by Vinktar's thirst for power.

lines.name: Vessel of Vinktar

explicitModifiers.text: (80-100)% increased Charges used
Shocks nearby Enemies during Flask effect, causing 10% increased Damage taken
You are Shocked during Flask effect, causing 50% increased Damage taken
20% of Physical Damage Converted to Lightning during Flask effect
20% of Lightning Damage Leeched as Life during Flask effect

lines.flavourText: The great city of storms, washed away by Vinktar's thirst for power.

lines.name: Vessel of Vinktar

explicitModifiers.text: (80-100)% increased Charges used
Shocks nearby Enemies during Flask effect, causing 10% increased Damage taken
You are Shocked during Flask effect, causing 50% increased Damage taken
Damage Penetrates 10% Lightning Resistance during Flask effect
20% of Lightning Damage Leeched as Life during Flask effect

lines.flavourText: The great city of storms, washed away by Vinktar's thirst for power.

lines.name: The Wise Oak

explicitModifiers.text: During Flask Effect, 10% reduced Damage taken of each Element for which your Uncapped Elemental Resistance is lowest
During Flask Effect, Damage Penetrates (10-15)% Resistance of each Element for which your Uncapped Elemental Resistance is highest

lines.flavourText:
The summer sun dries the soil and burns the leaves.
The autumn rain extinguishes the flames.
The spring bloom shades the wet earth.
Nature is an eternal tug of war.

lines.name: Zerphi's Last Breath

explicitModifiers.text: 50% increased Charges used
Grants Last Breath when you Use a Skill during Flask Effect, for (450-600)% of Mana Cost

lines.flavourText:
"Proof that if you devote yourself to a god of death,
you may be spared from its wrath."
- Icius Perandus, Antiquities Collection, Item 408

lines.name: Atziri's Promise

explicitModifiers.text: 2% of Chaos Damage Leeched as Life during Flask effect
Gain (15-20)% of Physical Damage as Extra Chaos Damage during effect
Gain (10-15)% of Elemental Damage as Extra Chaos Damage during effect

lines.flavourText:
"Death needs not your understanding. It needs only your loyalty." 
- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal

lines.name: Lavianga's Spirit

explicitModifiers.text: (30-50)% increased Amount Recovered
100% increased Recovery rate
Your Skills have no Mana Cost during Flask effect

lines.flavourText:
"When the Ancestors fill your cup,
It is only good manners to drink your fill."
- Lavianga, Advisor to Kaom

lines.name: The Writhing Jar

explicitModifiers.text: (65-75)% reduced Amount Recovered
Instant Recovery

2 Enemy Writhing Worms escape the Flask when used
Writhing Worms are destroyed when Hit
(10-20)% reduced Charges used

lines.flavourText:
To achieve godhood, they would cast off all that god has gifted us.
Mortality, compassion, even the sanctity of flesh.
 - High Templar Voll

lines.name: Witchfire Brew

implicitModifiers.text: Creates a Smoke Cloud on Use

explicitModifiers.text: 50% increased Charges used
(25-40)% increased Damage Over Time during Flask Effect
Grants Level 21 Despair Curse Aura during Flask Effect

lines.flavourText:
"Think of those that cursed us, judged us, 
and burned our sisters upon the pyre. 
Think of their names as you drink, 
and even their children will feel what we do to them today." 
-Vadinya, to her coven

lines.name: Coruscating Elixir

explicitModifiers.text: Chaos Damage does not bypass Energy Shield during effect

Removes all but one Life on use
Removed life is Regenerated as Energy Shield over 2 seconds
100% increased Duration

lines.flavourText:
Let blood sear in your veins, 
Let the pain push outwards and turn away your enemy's blows.

lines.name: Forbidden Taste

explicitModifiers.text: Recover (75-99)% of Life on use
Recover Full Life on use
8% of Maximum Life taken as Chaos Damage per second

lines.flavourText: Your reach exceeds your grasp.

lines.name: Kiara's Determination

explicitModifiers.text: Immune to Freeze, Chill, Curses and Stuns during Flask Effect
60% reduced Duration

lines.flavourText:
Travelers of the deep wood speak of a witch
whose ale provides a different kind
of liquid courage.

lines.name: Rotgut

explicitModifiers.text: (50-100)% increased Charges used
50% chance to gain a Flask Charge when you deal a Critical Strike
(10-30)% increased Movement Speed during Flask effect
Consumes Frenzy Charges on use
Gain Onslaught for 2 seconds per Frenzy Charge on use
50% increased Duration

lines.flavourText: Rancid, rotten, and wicked are those that dare to taste my serum.

lines.name: The Overflowing Chalice

explicitModifiers.text: 100% increased Charge Recovery
(10-20)% increased Duration
Gains no Charges during Effect of any Overflowing Chalice Flask
100% increased Charges gained by Other Flasks during Flask Effect

lines.flavourText: Empty cup, full of promise.

lines.name: Coralito's Signature

explicitModifiers.text: Take 30 Chaos Damage per Second during Flask effect
25% chance to Poison on Hit during Flask effect
Your Critical Strikes do not deal extra Damage during Flask effect
(50-75)% increased Duration of Poisons you inflict during Flask effect
Grants Perfect Agony during Flask effect

lines.flavourText:
"What cruelty it is, that to be judged a success,
such great work must go uncredited." 
- Coralito, Brotherhood of Silence

lines.name: Soul Catcher

explicitModifiers.text: Cannot gain Mana during effect
Vaal Skills have (80-120)% increased Critical Strike Chance during effect
Vaal Skills deal (80-120)% increased Damage during effect
Vaal Skills used during effect have (20-40)% reduced Soul Gain Prevention Duration

lines.flavourText:
Freedom is for the privileged, even in death.

<default>{This item can be transformed on the Altar of Sacrifice along with Vial of the Ghost}

lines.name: Doedre's Elixir

explicitModifiers.text: (120-150)% increased Charges used
Removes 20% of your maximum Energy Shield on use
You take 10% of your maximum Life as Chaos Damage on use
You gain a Power Charge on use
You gain a Frenzy Charge on use
You gain an Endurance Charge on use

lines.flavourText:
Doedre Darktongue knew the Way of the Thaumaturge.
In order to receive, one must give... without hesitation.
